name: Mystic Siphon
description: Violently drain the last spark of life from a corpse, dealing 4248 Shock Damage over 12 seconds to all enemies around the corpse and between you and the corpse.   You also restore 1260 Magicka over 12 seconds while siphoning the corpse.  While slotted, your damage done is increased by 3%.
effectLines: You restore Magicka while siphoning the corpse.

You also restore 1260 Magicka over 12 seconds while siphoning the corpse.  While slotted, your damage done is increased by 3%.
